verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees. <WH4609> Lord, <WH3068> remember <WH2142> David, <WH1732> and all <WH3605> his afflictions: <WH6031>
How <WH834> he swore <WH7650> to the LORD, <WH3068> and vowed <WH5087> to the mighty <WH46> God of Jacob; <WH3290>
Surely <WH518> I will not come <WH935> into the tabernacle <WH168> of my house, <WH1004> nor go <WH5927> up into <WH5921> my bed; <WH6210>
I will not give <WH5414> sleep <WH8142> to my eyes, <WH5869> or slumber <WH8572> to my eyelids, <WH6079>
Until <WH5704> I find <WH4672> out a place <WH4725> for the LORD, <WH3068> an habitation <WH4908> for the mighty <WH46> God of Jacob. <WH3290>
See, <WH2009> we heard <WH8085> of it at Ephratah: <WH672> we found <WH4672> it in the fields <WH7704> of the wood. <WH3293>
We will go <WH935> into his tabernacles: <WH4908> we will worship <WH7812> at his footstool. <WH1916> <WH7272>
Arise, <WH6965> O LORD, <WH3068> into your rest; <WH4496> you, and the ark <WH727> of your strength. <WH5797>
Let your priests <WH3548> be clothed <WH3847> with righteousness; <WH6664> and let your saints <WH2623> shout <WH7442> for joy. <WH7442>
For your servant <WH5650> David's <WH1732> sake <WH5668> turn <WH7725> not away the face <WH6440> of your anointed. <WH4899>
The LORD <WH3068> has sworn <WH7650> in truth <WH571> to David; <WH1732> he will not turn <WH7725> from it; Of the fruit <WH6529> of your body <WH990> will I set <WH7896> on your throne. <WH3678>

If <WH518> your children <WH1121> will keep <WH8104> my covenant <WH1285> and my testimony <WH5713> that I shall teach <WH3925> them, their children <WH1121> shall also <WH1571> sit <WH3427> on your throne <WH3678> for ever more. <WH5703>
For the LORD <WH3068> has chosen <WH977> Zion; <WH6726> he has desired <WH183> it for his habitation. <WH4186>
This is my rest <WH4496> for ever: <WH5703> here <WH6311> will I dwell; <WH3427> for I have desired <WH183> it.
I will abundantly <WH1288> bless <WH1288> her provision: <WH6718> I will satisfy <WH7646> her poor <WH34> with bread. <WH3899>
I will also clothe <WH3847> her priests <WH3548> with salvation: <WH3468> and her saints <WH2623> shall shout <WH7442> aloud <WH7442> for joy. <WH7442>
There <WH8033> will I make the horn <WH7161> of David <WH1732> to bud: <WH6779> I have ordained <WH6186> a lamp <WH5216> for my anointed. <WH4899>
His enemies <WH341> will I clothe <WH3847> with shame: <WH1322> but on himself shall his crown <WH5145> flourish. <WH6692>
